Name: Putinization
About the game: This is an arcade with unique mechanics based on your own reflexes. You're gonna have to dodge enemies (forks from hell and grill-devils), exploring Putin's hypostases. - The most thrilling gameplay since Teenage Mutant Ninja Cheburashkas. - Only one level - but it's the biggest one you've ever seen! - No mobile device support - embargo! - Some people say this game can cure alcoholism. Give it a try! Have you not seen enough Putin on your TV screen? Don't worry, Vladimir Vladimirovich lives on your desktop now too! Vladimir Vladimirovich won't abandon you!
